document.full_text: secure digital memory cards have a small plastic switch on the side that can be used to lock the card and prevent you from accidentally erasing its contents. here's how to undo it.
document.title: q&a: unlocking the mystery of a memory card error
lines_and_colors: secure digital memory cards have a small plastic switch on the side that can be used to lock the card and prevent you from accidentally erasing its contents. here's how to undo it.
